title: Facial Recognition Robotic Flower
description: Created a robotic flower using OpenCV and Raspberry Pi to recognize faces and react accordingly.

title: Data Science Summer Bootcamp
description: Taught high school students Python, NumPy, and machine learning concepts.

title: Emergency Keychain Alarm
description: Designed and built an IoT-based keychain alarm with a mobile app.

title: Sentiment Analysis for Bitcoin Market Trends
description: Analyzed Bitcoin sentiment using YouTube and article scraping with ML models.

title: Recipe Rating Prediction Model
description: Built a Decision Tree Classifier to predict recipe ratings.

title: Ceph Storage Cluster for In-flight Entertainment
description: Implemented a Ceph cluster on Raspberry Pi 5s to optimize storage for in-flight media streaming.

title: Improving Women's Health Outcomes
description: Worked on data-driven projects to improve healthcare equity for women.

title: Diversity in Physiological Data
description: Explored how physiological datasets can be more inclusive and representative.

title: Semi-supervised Behavior Annotation
description: Developed machine learning techniques for labeling behavioral data with minimal supervision.

title: Detection & Tracking of Pedestrians for Smart Vehicles
description: Used AI to track and predict pedestrian behavior for autonomous vehicles.

title: Blockchain for Secure Healthcare Data
description: Researched blockchain technology applications in healthcare privacy and security.

title: AI Ethics in Social Media Content Moderation
description: Analyzed biases in AI moderation models used for flagging inappropriate content.
